overview:
Co-founder & COO of CleverPPC, a PPC Agency & SEM management platform, creating, optimizing and finetuning large Adwords, Bing & Facebook accounts in verticals such as Finance and Travel.

With years of experience in large, multilingual SEM accounts (aprox. 20.000€/day), his last role prior to starting CleverPPC, was Vice President of Marketing at BudgetPlaces.com (a fast growing online travel agency for low cost accommodation).

Before joining BudgetPlaces, Fernando was Internet Marketing Director for Eurostars Hotels.

Fernando holds a bachelor’s of science degree in Business Administration from the University of Sevilla and an MBA from Northeastern University in Chicago, Illinois, as well as a CIS certificate from Harper College in Palatine, Illinois.
